ResourceProviderOperationList.description: Results of the request to list operations.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation applies to data-plane.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

operation.description: Type of operation: get, read, delete, etc.

display.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

port.description: Target server port for remote login

server.description: Server is the target server name or ip address to discover of SpringBootServer.

totalApps.description: The total number of apps been discovered

springBootApps.description: The total number of spring boot apps been discovered

appType.description: The application type, whether it is a SpringBoot app.

value.description: The application config file content, only contains config keys.

instanceCount.description: The total instance count the app deployed.

jarFileLocation.description: The jar file location on the server.

miscs.description: The other types of date collected.

runtimeJdkVersion.description: The jdk version installed on server

servers.description: The server list the app installed

machineArmIds.description: The machine ARM id list the app belongs to.

lastUpdatedTime.description: Time when this springbootapps instance was last updated.
